sub_title: Data Analyst in Real Estate and MBA Candidate Digital Transformation
summary:
Let's connect and discuss about the future of living, working, making holidays, storage, etc. and how we can leave an impact through real estate. 

Looking forward to connect with industry professionals from all angles of real estate to increase mutual knowledge.

certifications.name: Advanced Real Estate Analytics
certifications.authority: IREBS International Real Estate Business School, University of Regensburg

company.name: IREBS International Real Estate Business School, University of Regensburg

profile_positions.description:
- responsible for research of economic data in Germany, Austria, Czech Republic, Hungary, Poland and Romania in the Market Research and Data Analytics team
- building and maintaining a database for offices within Germany, Austria and CEE as well as other key focus markets
- preparation and presentation of quarterly reporting of market decks
- performance analysis of individual office assets in comparison to market and/or micro location performance
- bringing another dimension to data by spatial analysis with GIS software and visualisation according to location data
- data visualisation and presentation with various different tools 
- ad-hoc reportings
- regular exchange with local experts from brokerage, cunsulting, architecture, governmental entities and research perpective to align findings in market developments
- risk and opportunity analysis of several modern asset classes, including but not limited to serviced living (including senior living and hospitaltiy), data centres, self-storages, life sience and industrial
- advanced big data processing in Excel
profile_positions.title: Data Analyst | Market Research & Data Analytics

profile_positions.description:

profile_positions.description:
- Trusted advisor to the Executive Team during development and implementation of the strategic plan 
- Developing and managing relationships and communicating with: Funders, partners, and other stakeholders 
- Approving budgets, audit reports, and material business decisions; being informed of, and meeting all, legal and fiduciary responsibilities 
- Reviewing outcomes and metrics created by Sales and Marketing for evaluating its impact, and regularly measuring its performance and effectiveness using those metrics 
- Coordinating a performance evaluation 
- Assisting in recruiting board members and volunteers 
- Periodically consulting with board members on their roles and helping them assess their performance 
- Planning, presiding over and facilitating board and committee meetings;  ensuring those board resolutions are carried out 
- Acting ambassador for the organization 
Ensuring commitment to a diverse board and staff that reflects the values of TEDx and Hotelschool The Hague
- Internal communication with Hotelschool the Hague and industry partners
- Ensuring professional and fluent communication within the Executive Team
- Reviewing published content for the alignment with TEDx guidelines and values
- Meetings with Executuve Board members to discuss future strategies and development within the process
profile_positions.title: Chairman of the Board | TedxHotelschoolTheHague

profile_positions.description:
- Ensuring Customer Satisfaction (Guest Feedback, Social Media Review)
- Night Audit 
- Checking Financial Performance (Up selling, Room Revenue)
- Updating guest profiles
- Creating new procedures
- Tracking IHG rewards satisfaction

profile_positions.title: Guest Experience Agent | Pre-Opening and Opening

profile_positions.location: AlRayyan Hotel Doha, Curio Collection by Hilton, Doha, Quatar
profile_positions.description:
Management Internship in Front Office and Business Development (Groups Conference and Events)

Front Office:

- Ensuring Customer Satisfaction (Guest Feedback, Social Media Review)
- Checking Financial Performance (Up selling, Room Revenue)
- Showing Initiative through inventing the program "Curiosity" to gather more guest information from the operational departments in order to get more information for the CRM report
- Welcoming guests and ensuring customer loyalty through tracking of SALT scores and HES score and implementation of related procedures (increase of 15 points in HES score within two month)
- Ensuring personalized service for each and every guest.
- Creating new Enrollment Targets and Procedures together with the team for Hilton Honors Enrollments (percentage increased by 4x during 2 month)

Groups Conference and Events:

- Solid use of the Delphi program to input rooms, event booking, and potential revenue
- Preparing event and/or room offers to clients and following up with them
- Answering RFP’s (Request for Proposal) from Meeting Broker and Cvent
- Preparing official contracts in order to confirm bookings
- Taking care of government related event requirements
- Handling big scale groups from enquiry response to room check out
- Handling Business Meetings, Social Events, and Weddings
- Preparing the  BEO (Banquet Event Order) for all hotel departments
- Participating in the weekly Operations meeting in order to communicate all event details to other hotel departments
- Meeting potential clients and acquiring business
- Preparing daily and weekly reports for the RMCC (Revenue Management Consolidated Center).
- Participating in regulary meetings with the Revenue manager and the Director of Business Development in order to understand the revenue analysis process.
profile_positions.title: Management Trainee

profile_positions.location: Conrad Maldives Rangali Island, Rangali Island, Maldives
profile_positions.description:
- Responsible for meeting and assisting guest upon their arrivals, during their stay and departures from the resort
- Assists resort guests efficiently, courteously and professionally and ensure their satisfaction during their stay
- Solving problems to the satisfaction of the guest
- Enrolling guest to the loyalty program Hilton Honors
- Tracking the Satisfaction of previous guest during their stay through SALT and implementing procedures for improvement
- Working with the new HES score and creating awareness in the team
-Upselling rooms, dining experiences and excursions
- Cross exposure with recreation
